moves.6... e5 7. Nb3 Be7 8. f3 Be6 9. Qd2: All is standard at the moment, I think White is going to castle long
moves.9... O-O 10. Rg1: Not sure about this move developing a bishop or castling would have seemed more logical to me, but I'm sure white is going to storm the kingside, I am going to storm the Queenside..
moves.10... Nbd7 11. g4 a5 12. g5 Nh5 13. f4: My knight is badly placed and this will allow me to get rid of the bishop
moves.23. cxd3 Qb2+ 24. Ke3 Qxb5: Whites king looks a little vulnerable, whereas the black king is quite safe
moves.29. Kf3 Qxd3+ 30. Kg2 Bd6: QxB Bh3+, Kf2 or Kg1 Qe3..the rest is history
